rooms.name: Quarters
rooms.description: Your personal quarters in the SGC.
rooms.objective: Go to the briefing room and talk to General Hammond.

rooms.name: Armory
rooms.objective: Go to the Gate room and travel to mars.

default: General Hammond has already informed me of the situation. I take it you have already talked with Hammond?
I heard Hammond briefed you. So, whats the plan, flyboy?
Hammond told me about your mission. You all set?
Can I take some equipment?: Choose a few weapons, which will make your mission easier.
Help yourself to the armory. Better safe than sorry, right?
Id recommend something with a punch. Grab what you need; were not short on ammo.
Will you join me?: The doctor didnt allow me to join you guys this time, but I am sure you will manage just fine.
Id go with you, but orders are orders. Just dont forget to bring me a souvenir.
Doc says Im grounded this round. Youll be fine, Im sure.
Where do I need to go?: Carter and Tealc are already waiting in the gateroom. Join them.
The gates active soon. Carter and Tealc have your back once you step through.
Youll find Charlie and Tealc near the gate. Theyre prepping for the trip.

rooms.name: Briefing Room
rooms.objective: Go to the Armory and talk to Jack O Neill.

default: Good morning, are you ready for your next off-world mission?
Welcome back, soldier. I trust youre prepared for your upcoming assignment?
Another day, another mission through the Stargate. Ready when you are.
get briefed: The Jaffa have built an outpost on Mars and transported a Stargate there. Your mission is to plant C4 in the base.
Our intelligence confirms a Jaffa presence on Mars. Your task is to neutralize their outpost.
Weve received reports that the Jaffa have entrenched themselves on Mars. Its up to you to deal with them.
ask further: The Jaffa base on Mars is heavily fortified. Take what you need from the armory.
Be careful out there. The Martian outpost wont be easy to breach. Make sure youre well equipped.
The armory is fully stocked. I suggest you pick up additional gear before heading off-world.
bye: The entire planet is counting on your success. Good luck.
I know you wont let us down. Return safely, and may fortune favor you.
This is vital for Earths future. Do what you must, and come back a hero.

default: It is good to see you. Are you ready for your mission?
I await your command. The path ahead is challenging, but I trust your courage.
You will return, friend. Im am sure of it.
when do we go?: Our Tokra intelligence has reported that the Stargate on Mars is heavily guarded. That means you will go alone.
The Tokra warned us of heavy resistance. I regret I cannot accompany you this time.
The Jaffa presence is strong. I must remain here, but I believe in your strength.

rooms.name: Chappa'ai
rooms.description: The stargate the Goauld have brought to Mars.
rooms.objective: Plant C4 in the Reactor room without being killed.

default: You will not survive this battle, Tauri!
Your end is near, Human!
I look forward to your defeat.
engage: For the glory of the gods, you will perish!
Prepare yourself, Tauri, the gods demand your life!
Now we fight, and I shall prove my worth to the gods!

rooms.name: Hill
rooms.description: A small hill on Mars with a view of the Goauld base.

default: It is good to see you.
You made it this far. Excellent.
Greetings, traveler.
information: There are 2 entrances to the base, from the front and the back.
The base can be approached from two angles. Choose wisely.
farewell: I cant stick around for much longer or they will suspect something.
I must go. My cover is at risk.
I wish you luck, but I must leave before Iâ€™m discovered.

rooms.name: Front Gate
rooms.description: The heavily guarded entrance of the base.

rooms.name: Back Entrance
rooms.description: The other entrance of the base... probably less guarded.

rooms.name: Reactor
rooms.description: The Reactor room of the base.
rooms.objective: After planting C4, use the Chappaai to travel to the hatak.

rooms.name: Hall
rooms.description: The hallway in the Goauld base.

default: You will die for this, Human!
The gods demand your head, Human!
Look upon your doom!
engage: Kneel before your gods and we will give you an honorable death.
Submit, and we may spare you a swift end.
Prove your worth or perish like so many before you.

rooms.name: Bridge
rooms.description: The command center of the Hatak ship.
rooms.objective: Plant a grande in the shieldgenerator.

default: You dare challenge the might of Ra, the Sun God?
I am Ra, eternal and unmatched. Your audacity will be punished.
To stand against Ra is to stand against the sun itself!

rooms.name: Transporter Room
rooms.description: A Stargate is here for transporting between planets.
rooms.objective: Locate and kill the system lord.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: A long hallway leading to different parts of the ship.

rooms.name: Shuttle Bay
rooms.description: The bay for storing ships and shuttles.

rooms.name: Shield Generator
rooms.description: The shield generator of the Ha'tak ship.
